name: Journey of Madman
description: This is a sequel to Mediocre Misadventures of Just Simon 2 Force Union, Semuar realized that now this is his showtime has come to stole the crown of Shimon and became a villain number, but it won't be easy, because somehow knowing about plans of jester Shimon has gathered his own allies, not just video game villains, but truly bastards who gone away with their deeds, Black Cat from Witch's House, Stacey from Yume Nikki Fangame ".ExE", The Strange Boy from Pocket Mirror, Bad Ending Aria from Aria's Story and Devil Yuppie from Yuppie Psycho, join to Semuar in his MAD journey, he maybe a madman, but have a brain, it's time to prove it.
